package.name: loadsys/cakephp-libregistry
package.description: The LibRegistry provides a mechanism for loading and storing instances of non-Cake PHP libraries. It works a lot like Cake 3's TableRegistry. Object instances can be requested by name and instantiated automatically, or can be loaded into the registry manually.
